description:
Across the animal kingdom, mothers tend to be the most common parents. But for these egg-laying critters, the fathers get involved, too.

The post 8 animal fathers that take care of their eggs appeared first on Popular Science.
title: 8 animal fathers that take care of their eggs

description:
NASA’s regularly scheduled International Space Station livestream gave viewers a brief, unintended scare last night. At 6:28PM EST on June 12, an unidentified speaker appeared to begin directing ISS crewmembers to treat a commander suffering from severe decompression sickness whose “prognosis… is relatively tenuous.”  “Check his pulse one more time,” the person, likely a mission […]

The post ‘Check his pulse one more time’: NASA accidentally airs ISS emergency test appeared first on Popular Science.
title: ‘Check his pulse one more time’: NASA accidentally airs ISS emergency test

description:
This feature was originally featured on The Conversation. As flowers bloom and temperatures climb, many are eager to get back outside. But while the Sun may be shining, there is a dark side that can make the great outdoors not so great. Gangs of germs are lurking in the woods, in the soil, in the […]

The post How to avoid getting sick at the barbecue, in the pool, or on the trail this summer appeared first on Popular Science.
title: How to avoid getting sick at the barbecue, in the pool, or on the trail this summer
